body.p: Carrollton, Kentucky, wharf master. Indiana native. Married Hannah Hamilton. Father of Clifford Hamilton, George W. Hamilton, and Mary E. Hamilton. Wharf master in Carrollton in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Carrollton District No. 2, p. 16; G. W. Hawes, G.W. Hawes' Commercial Gazetteer, and Business Directory of the Ohio River (Indianapolis, IN: G.W. Hawes, Publisher, 1861), 146.
